decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Photo Montage x2, Design and Access Statement, Block Plan received 22/12/10.Window plans and photo montage received 09/01/11)and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is occupied

Condition : 3 - Samples of the uPVC framing (and how the finialled mullions will be maintained/replicated) to be used in the development hereby permitted shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the development is commenced. The framing used in the development shall conform to the samples so approved.
description: Replacement of existing timber sash windows with new UPVC double glazed sash windows to match.
